title: Curried Potato and Carrot Soup
ingredients: ['1 bouquet garni', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 potato, peeled and chopped', '1 tablespoon creme fraiche', '1 teaspoon chopped parsley for garnish', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '2 litres vegetable stock', '5 carrots, peeled and thickly sliced', '1 knob butter']
